sentences.english: The recycling volunteers and the other vendors at the market have all witnessed the change in Lin's personality.
sentences.chinese: 慈济志工和市场的其他摊贩，目睹林江能个性的改变。

sentences.english: Jordan's Tzu Chi organization once again travel to the Wadi Abdoun district to bring hot food to the tent city.
sentences.chinese: 约旦慈济志工前往洼地阿顿地区，为居民带来热食。

sentences.english: Thanks to volunteers' concerted effort, Norhayati's house is now brimming with love.
sentences.chinese: 感谢志工的关怀，诺哈雅蒂的家，现在载著满满的爱。

sentences.english: This is a group fulling of great love for story-telling and performing.
sentences.chinese: 一群热爱说故事及表演的志工团体。

sentences.english: Huang lives his life to the fullest by volunteering at his local hospital and recycling station.
sentences.chinese: 现在他在当地医院及环保站，做一位全职志工。

sentences.english: These volunteers are devoted to helping the poor.
sentences.chinese: 这些志工致力于帮助贫困人家。

sentences.english: The entire fence is patrolled every two weeks by scores of local volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 整个围栏每两周由当地的志工巡逻一次。

sentences.english: MIT Habitat supports local HFH affiliates through volunteer labor and fundraising.
sentences.chinese: 他们透过志工和募款的方法支援当地的HFH联盟。

sentences.english: Volunteers have been providing long term care, hoping to help the family emerge from illness and poverty.
sentences.chinese: 慈济志工长期关怀，要帮助这家人走出贫病阴霾。

sentences.english: Tzu Chi volunteers in Chengdu begin to prepare for their winter aid distribution in quake-hit Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 成都慈济志工开始为四川地震灾民，做冬令发放准备。

sentences.english: Most were first-timers to eye surgery, so volunteers stood by their sides to comfort them.
sentences.chinese: 很多都是第一次做眼部手术，志工在一旁安抚他们。

sentences.english: The group is welcomed by more than 100 eager people - who arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 一百多位的民众热切的等著提早抵达的志工。

sentences.english: Tzu Chi volunteers also cooperated with a local Hospital - the Municipal Frances , of Santa Cruz.
sentences.chinese: 慈济志工也与当地一所圣塔库兹的法国医院合作。

sentences.english: Local officials recognized volunteers by naming special days in honor of Tzu Chi.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府感念志工，特地将这天命名为慈济日。

sentences.english: Meng -Ay Church is lack of volunteers to help students to do their homework.
sentences.chinese: 蒙爱教会于下午时段需要志工协助教会学童课后辅导。

sentences.english: Tzu Chi volunteers held a ground-breaking ceremony to celebrate the launch of a village relocation project for Rouli Township residents.
sentences.chinese: 慈济志工举办动土奠基仪式，庆祝若笠乡迁村计画。

definition: mental disorder (abbr. for 精神障礙|精神障碍[jing1 shen2 zhang4 ai4]) (Tw)
(Tw) intellectually impaired child or youth (affectionate term)
to donate blood/also written 供血
Xizhi or Hsichih city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
